0.name: Teacherbot
0.content: Have you seen three kittens running around here? There should be six of us... but I guess a few got bored and ran off.

1.content: These students and I are on a nature excursion. We're taking water samples and studying local ecology.

2.name: Daisy
2.text: Can you help us find them please?

3.name: Caramel
3.content: Yeah, we're tired of being educated. We want to go home!

foundthem1.name: Teacherbot
foundthem1.content: There you all are!@If I had emotions, I'd have been worried sick about you kittens!

foundthem2.name: Sparkle
foundthem2.content: Sorry Teacherbot...@Next time, we'll give you a heads up before skipping class.

foundthem4.name: Lethe
foundthem4.content: Is it time to leave yet? I want to go home and have a nap.

foundthem5.name: Teacherbot
foundthem5.content: By my calculations, yes.@Let's start our hike back to GeoCity.

foundthem6.content: Thank you for all of the help, and good luck on your adventures!

foundthem7.content: There's a telescope at the top of this mountain's lookout tower, it offers an amazing view of the ring we're on.@It's totally worth the climb!
